title: Attendance at Cineplex cinemas 2010 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Attendance in millions, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2010.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2015.
gold: The timeline presents the attendance figures at Cineplex from 2010 to 2018 . In 2018 , 69.27 million people attended movies at the Canadian movie theater chain , down from 70.4 million visitors a year earlier .
